title: Bring out the barista in you with De’Longhi, Coffee Expert
text: Version 2.50 of the app features a comprehensive barista section and coffee-making guide to help you master the perfect cappuccino, latte and espresso. There is a tutorial with David Cooper, former head judge of the UK Barista Championships as well as a barista masterclass with professional trainer Jon Skinner. The app encourages you to get creative in the kitchen too. You will find a great selection of recipes where coffee takes centre stage, from hot drinks and cocktails to biscuits and desserts. There is even a handy feature that calculates how much money you could save over a year by making coffee at home Coffee Expert’s educational aspect is also designed to help you appreciate the intricacies of coffee varieties and origins and their associated styles. If you don’t yet know your mocha from your maragogype, this feature can guide you from the Horn of Africa to Latin America and beyond to find your ideal coffee. If you are considering purchasing a De’Longhi bean-to-cup coffee machine for your home, the ‘find my ideal machine’ feature walks you through the options towards the model best suited to you, based on your lifestyle and coffee preferences. There is even a handy feature that calculates in seconds how much money you could save over a year by making coffee at home. Whatever machine you select, there are coffee making tutorials specific to every bean-to-cup model. You will find a great selection of recipes where coffee takes centre stage, from hot drinks and cocktails to biscuits and desserts The personalisation of the app doesn’t stop there. You may already be the perfect host but the app makes your role a little easier by storing details of what you and your guests prefer. And if you are fortunate enough to already own a De’Longhi bean-to-cup coffee machine, you can activate these stored preferences at the single touch of button, rather than key in the details on your machine every time. Looking after your coffee machine is quick and easy too, once you know how. The De’Longhi, Coffee Expert has a comprehensive maintenance section to help you keep your machine in perfect working order. De’Longhi, Coffee Expert for iPad and iPhone is free to download from iTunes and for android at Google Play
